oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Currin, R.P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 8; 26; 17.0x40.0; 341; III; 07/20/1854; This vault flooded in 1920--moved to Mount Olivet were: (latter four names) reburied in front of the vault (their graves are marked by a slab); Harrison, Ellen Trabue; Harrison, Horace H.; Trabue, Andrew E.; Smith, Ralph P.; Smith, Anne Nicholson; Smith, Currin; Smith, Anne H.
